column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Babareeba is one of my favorite restaurants in the city. I've been here many times and always have a great meal every time. Dinner is v good of course
column2: but my fave is def brunch bc you can order off the brunch menu and the dinner menu. The staples I always get are the goat cheese with marinara
column7: and stuffed shrooms. Off the brunch menu
column8: I love the potato and onion omelette
column11: and beef tenderloin Benedict. They also have fantastic sangria. Service is always excellent
column12: major props for that! Highly recommend making a reservation and parking is sort of rough on Halsted. Pro tip: park on Armitage
